amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for military aid to Egypt by $750 million and transfer the $750 million to the USAID Child Survival and Health Programs Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funding for military aid to Egypt by $750 million and to transfer the $750 million to accounts for child survival and health programs under USAID.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pitts amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 87 - 326 (Roll no. 326).
